  Graph: EventGraph
    Node: OnCreateContainedItems_ServerRELIABLE Replicated From Client
Executes On Server
Custom Event (K2Node_CustomEvent)
      Pin: OutputDelegate (delegate) Dir=Out
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Create Contained Items Server
Target is BP Shop Vendor.execute
    Node: Event BeginPlay (K2Node_Event)
      Pin: OutputDelegate (delegate) Dir=Out
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Parent: BeginPlay.execute
    Node: Event OnCloseInventory
From BPI Inventory (K2Node_Event)
      Pin: OutputDelegate (delegate) Dir=Out
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Close Inventory Client
Target is BP Shop Vendor.execute
    Node: Interaction, this should only be called by an Actor with inventory & interaction component (EdGraphNode_Comment)
    Node: Setup (EdGraphNode_Comment)
    Node: Inventory logic (EdGraphNode_Comment)
    Node: Fills the item crate inventory from the raw data in ContainedItems (EdGraphNode_Comment)

Executes On Server

        -> Begin Overlap
Target is BP Inventory Actor Component.OtherActor

      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> End Overlap

      Pin: OtherActor (object) Dir=Out
        -> End Overlap
Target is BP Inventory Actor Component.OtherActor

Target is BP Inventory Actor Component (K2Node_CallFunction)

        -> Event ActorBeginOverlap.then

  Graph: UserConstructionScript
    Node: Construction Script (K2Node_FunctionEntry)
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Parent: Construction Script.execute
    Node: Parent: Construction Script (K2Node_CallParentFunction)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> Construction Script.then
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Branch.execute
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
    Node: New Guid (K2Node_CallFunction)
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
      Pin: ReturnValue (struct) Dir=Out
        -> Set UniqueID.UniqueID
    Node: Equal (Guid) (K2Node_CallFunction)
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
      Pin: A (struct) Dir=In
        -> Get UniqueID.UniqueID
      Pin: B (struct) Dir=In
        -> Make Guid.Guid
      Pin: ReturnValue (bool) Dir=Out
        -> Branch.Condition
    Node: Make Guid (K2Node_MakeStruct)
      Pin: Guid (struct) Dir=Out
        -> Equal (Guid).B
    Node: Branch (K2Node_IfThenElse)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> Parent: Construction Script.then
      Pin: Condition (bool) Dir=In
        -> Equal (Guid).ReturnValue
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Set UniqueID.execute
      Pin: else (exec) Dir=Out
    Node: Generate a unique GUID that is only set once (EdGraphNode_Comment)
    Node: Get BP_InventoryComponent (K2Node_VariableGet)
      Pin: BP_InventoryComponent (object) Dir=Out
        -> Get UniqueID.self
        -> Set UniqueID.self
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
    Node: Get UniqueID (K2Node_VariableGet)
      Pin: UniqueID (struct) Dir=Out
        -> Equal (Guid).A
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
        -> Get BP_InventoryComponent.BP_InventoryComponent
    Node: Set UniqueID (K2Node_VariableSet)

      Pin: ReturnValue (bool) Dir=Out
        -> Branch.Condition

        -> Switch on EVendorMode.Selection
    Node: Return Node (K2Node_FunctionResult)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> Play Sound 2D.then
        -> Play Sound 2D.then
    Node: Play Sound 2D (K2Node_CallFunction)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> Switch on EVendorMode.NewEnumerator0
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Return Node.execute
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
      Pin: WorldContextObject (object) Dir=In
      Pin: Sound (object) Dir=In
        -> Get BuyModeSound.BuyModeSound
      Pin: VolumeMultiplier (real) Dir=In
      Pin: PitchMultiplier (real) Dir=In

        -> Self-Reference.self
      Pin: bIsUISound (bool) Dir=In

      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> PlayVendorModeSound.then
      Pin: Selection (byte) Dir=In
        -> PlayVendorModeSound.VendorMode
      Pin: NotEqual_ByteByte (object) Dir=In

        -> Play Sound 2D.execute
      Pin: NewEnumerator1 (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Play Sound 2D.execute

        -> Play Sound 2D.Sound
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In

        -> Play Sound 2D.OwningActor

      Pin: self (object) Dir=Out
        -> Play Sound 2D.OwningActor
    Node: Play Sound when switching between Buy and Sell (EdGraphNode_Comment)
  Graph: PlayBuySellSound
    Node: PlayBuySellSound (K2Node_FunctionEntry)
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Switch on EVendorMode.execute
      Pin: VendorMode (byte) Dir=Out
        -> Switch on EVendorMode.Selection
    Node: Return Node (K2Node_FunctionResult)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> Play Sound 2D.then
        -> Play Sound 2D.then
    Node: Play Sound 2D (K2Node_CallFunction)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> Switch on EVendorMode.NewEnumerator0
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Return Node.execute
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
      Pin: WorldContextObject (object) Dir=In
      Pin: Sound (object) Dir=In
        -> Get BuySound.BuySound
      Pin: VolumeMultiplier (real) Dir=In
      Pin: PitchMultiplier (real) Dir=In
      Pin: StartTime (real) Dir=In
      Pin: ConcurrencySettings (object) Dir=In
      Pin: OwningActor (object) Dir=In
      Pin: bIsUISound (bool) Dir=In
    Node: Switch on EVendorMode (K2Node_SwitchEnum)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> PlayBuySellSound.then
      Pin: Selection (byte) Dir=In
        -> PlayBuySellSound.VendorMode
      Pin: NotEqual_ByteByte (object) Dir=In
      Pin: NewEnumerator0 (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Play Sound 2D.execute
      Pin: NewEnumerator1 (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Play Sound 2D.execute
    Node: Play Sound 2D (K2Node_CallFunction)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> Switch on EVendorMode.NewEnumerator1
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Return Node.execute
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
      Pin: WorldContextObject (object) Dir=In

      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
    Node: Play Sound on Buy or Sale (EdGraphNode_Comment)
  Graph: IsItemSaleAllowed
    Node: IsItemSaleAllowed (K2Node_FunctionEntry)
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> For Each Loop.Exec
      Pin: Item (object) Dir=Out
        -> Equal (Object).B
    Node: Get VendorItemData (K2Node_VariableGet)
      Pin: VendorItemData (object) Dir=Out
        -> Get ItemsToSell.self
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
    Node: Get ItemsToSell (K2Node_VariableGet)
      Pin: ItemsToSell (struct) Dir=Out
        -> For Each Loop.Array
      Pin: self (object) Dir=In
        -> Get VendorItemData.VendorItemData
    Node: For Each Loop (K2Node_MacroInstance)
      Pin: Exec (exec) Dir=In
        -> IsItemSaleAllowed.then
      Pin: Array (struct) Dir=In
        -> Get ItemsToSell.ItemsToSell
      Pin: LoopBody (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Branch.execute
      Pin: Array Element (struct) Dir=Out
        -> Break FVendor Item.FVendorItem
      Pin: Array Index (int) Dir=Out
      Pin: Completed (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Return Node.execute
    Node: Break FVendor Item (K2Node_BreakStruct)
      Pin: FVendorItem (struct) Dir=In
        -> For Each Loop.Array Element
      Pin: Item_2_EE573D8F4A94BD94DDE68DBE2DE16A91 (object) Dir=Out
        -> Equal (Object).A
      Pin: Price_13_6D0A237C4FB8274C3EF0C2B29B6071E9 (int) Dir=Out
      Pin: Amount_12_654A73114D3116EBB81C82AF94F76640 (int) Dir=Out
      Pin: RandomChanceToSpawn_24_4DE3ECCF40D444D5612DC185F97A38CB (real) Dir=Out
      Pin: RandomMinAmount_25_59D4621E452DBA2A407CC9935C19E513 (int) Dir=Out
      Pin: RandomMaxAmount_26_9832ABA84755483ECCDFCA880B2D0A4F (int) Dir=Out
    Node: Return Node (K2Node_FunctionResult)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> Branch.then
      Pin: bSaleIsAllowed (bool) Dir=In
    Node: Branch (K2Node_IfThenElse)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> For Each Loop.LoopBody
      Pin: Condition (bool) Dir=In
        -> Equal (Object).ReturnValue
      Pin: then (exec) Dir=Out
        -> Return Node.execute
      Pin: else (exec) Dir=Out
    Node: Return Node (K2Node_FunctionResult)
      Pin: execute (exec) Dir=In
        -> For Each Loop.Completed
      Pin: bSaleIsAllowed (bool) Dir=In
    Node: Check if Sale of an Item is allowed at this Vendor (EdGraphNode_Comment)
    Node: Equal (Object) (K2Node_PromotableOperator)
      Pin: A (object) Dir=In
        -> Break FVendor Item.Item_2_EE573D8F4A94BD94DDE68DBE2DE16A91
      Pin: B (object) Dir=In
        -> IsItemSaleAllowed.Item
      Pin: ReturnValue (bool) Dir=Out
        -> Branch.Condition
      Pin: ErrorTolerance (None) Dir=In
